title: Marvel Point One II (Trade Paperback)
description:
the program washouts! War Machine is rebooted as Iron Man 2.0! The X-Men battle a demonic horde! Herc is
hunted by a figure from his past! Young Loki learns about his former life! X-Factor investigates a very personal
mystery! Songbird huntS for the escaped Thunderbolts! Norman Osborn returns to menace the New Avengers!
Plus: Who will be the new Ghost Rider? Can the Black Panther locate a killer before he strikes again? And who are
the Villains for Hire? Collecting ALPHA FLIGHT (2011) #0.1, DAKEN: DARK WOLVERINE #9.1, AVENGERS ACADEMY
#14.1, GHOST RIDER (2011) #0.1, IRON MAN 2.0 #7.1, X-MEN (2010) #15.1, HERC #6.1, JOURNEY INTO MYSTERY
(1952) #626.1, X-FACTOR (1986) #224.1, VILLAINS FOR HIRE #0.1, THUNDERBOLTS #163.1, BLACK PANTHER: THE
DEADLIEST MAN ALIVE #523.1 and NEW AVENGERS (2010) #16.1.
